content: Something I'd like from ChatGPT or a plug-in. Now that I have the ability to program it, by telling it for example that only program in JavaScript and not PHP, I'd like to create a notebook of things I'd like it to tell people who inquire about a product I'm developing. As I'm working on the code, I develop features that never make it into the docs. But when I'm focused on them, working on the feature, I take lots of notes in my work outline. I'd like to give that outline to a LLM and let it figure out which product I'm talking about by the context it appears in.
